comment: I would have to disagree with other reviews. Her course is very clear and if you receive a bad grade its only due to missing a date or not following instructions. Her course is very fun and the material is VERY engaging. She is definitely there for you as well. She practically saved me but do you work people! Seriously she is not to be blamed. AA++

Literally the worst professor I have ever taken in my 5 years of going to college. She has the worst grading scale of any professor. Every single discussion post is out of 3 points. If you get get a single question wrong, you fail it no questions asked. Took 30 points off a paper because I didn't cite a source I never even used. DO NOT TAKE!!!

This teacher is the worst teacher i have ever seen in my 2 year college career.  Never ever take her if you love your GPA. She is rude as you are an enemy to her. Drop her right now if you still have time. i worked day and night to get an A and she never counted my extra credits and gave me B on 89.50%.  Just never take her Folks.

The major assignment for the class is a group project meant for 4-5 people and my group consisted of 2 due to dropouts and she graded us as if the amount of work was split between 5 people and gave us no extra time. A paper that receives an A in an English class gets a C in her class somehow, even with feedback of "Good paper!" Not helpful.

She is an interesting lady and so is her class. Most of the class time are spend on watching old films, so it's quite easy. The biggest part of the grade is the group presentation, you should pay attention to that. The textbook is boring and all the quiz question is from the book.

Let me say, I HATE group projects and that was the major thing in this class. It is literally, the ONLY assignment. You have quizzes online that you can cheat on pretty much. You have 2 attempts. I didn't even read the book. I skipped the days of the group presentations cause they would have been boring. Only took because of major requirement.

Unless your a science geek this class stinks. Once a week for over 2 hours is even worst when it is as boring as she makes it. Watch stupid videos and have to read a pointless novel that I never read and aced all the quizzes. Group project is very confusing and she doesn't clarify it at all. Take with a friend cause its a class you dread going to.

This class can be pretty easy. The only problem is that there are major assignments that are big parts of your grade, and she's not clear enough about them, and how she grades them. For example she might have some expectations from an annotated bibliography that she never talks to you guys about it! One good thing is that her class is not boring

She was a cool teacher, lots of class discussion but more work than you might expect. Some pop quizzes, a huge group presentation that you spend most of the semester working on which was confusing at times. She didn't give too much work though. Can be a stringent grader compared to most lit-based professors.

Easiest class I have ever taken! Just show up, talk about sci-fi stuff, and leave. We talked about Frankenstein, aliens, and all sorts of nifty things. Show up and do the minimal work she assigns and you will do just fine! Her personality is the best, and she is very honest about how she feels about subject matter. Highly recommend!

this teacher is very upbeat about current scientific events and technology...class is basically a lecture for you to open your minds on inventions that really are pointless but some people think need..overall u CANNOT fail her class if you do I dont feel you should even be in college!

Every lecture was about science fiction and current events. Had to type 3 essays which are related to your major. One group project which is a big part of your grade.... Just due those and you'll be fine

Terrible feedback. Took over three months to get grades. Is unnecessarily harsh. Weekly writing, along with three additional 5 page papers and a group project. The group project is worth a huge part of your grade too. Avoid this prof like the plague. The worst college prof I have had to date.

GREAT PROFESSOR...I encourae you to take this professor no matter the class.  She cares..Not many of those still around..Learned alot.  She is really an encouragement.  Remember go online everyday and reply to discussions.  Focus point in class.

I liked this class and the professor. As stated by others, she leads a fine discussion class, and the assignments have very clear guidelines. As long as you do the work, show up to class, and participate in the discussions, you should be fine. Be wary of the quizzes!

This class is pretty easy. She gives very clear, detailed instructions for all the assignments on the course website. Extra credit assignments are on the calendar and are very easy. There are a few short papers and an easy group project. Show up for class and do the assignments as instructed and you can easily get an A.

I'm not sure what people below me are talking about. Potter leads a rather free discussion class, and we sit there most times just talking or watching movies. The papers I did were awfully put-together, so I didn't expect an A. Although, I don't think the work she makes us do is worth the hours you get for this~

This class is not an easy online subject. You will read, you will write then do it some more. The group project is the most important thing in the class. Almost half your grade. The subject material is great, but there is a ton of work that goes along with it.

this is the worst teacher ever.  she teaches this stupid online class that everyone has to take.  she treats it more seriously than my architecture class.  i wrote a 9 page paper for a very demanding English class (that a lot of people failed) and got a 94, i wrote a very good paper for this class and got a 87.  do not take, bad teacher

This is the first time i feel really hopeless in course subject. No matter how good I was doing in her online class, she always give C in my paper. She is very unorganized and yet never admit she is making mistake... (she favor only american, if you are an outsider.... gl with it)

Doesnt require a textbook. Gives a quiz on the only 3 readings she assigns and has a ton of extra credit opportunities. You turn in like 4 papers the entire class, most are like 2-3 pages at most. VERY EASY A. She has a dry type of humor that can come off as snobby, but she's a really nice lady. She's really helpful as long as you dont miss class

When you take STS 2400, DON'T take it with Potter.. Take this class with the other teachers. She is snobby and picky with the assignments. The only thing I like about this class is watching interesting science fiction films. Also, there is not much homework and textbook is not required.

Took this class, thought it was going to be easy, and it was.  However, her attitude and personality was extremely snobby and stuck up.  I was 3 points away from an A in the class, I was in class every day, and she wouldnt give me the A.

Ms. Potter is GREAT! I enjoyed this class much more than I ever imagined.  Of course, I only this class because it's required, but I truly learned a lot of valuable information.  Ms. Potter is very professional and organized.  If you show up for the classes and participate in the discussions, you'll get an A!
Great Teacher!, Easy, but very interesting and fun...I took the Science Fiction STS and we watched movie clips from The Matrix, Journey to the center of the earth, E.T., etc.
